name: Boyband V Girlband - Direction Of One Game Free
name_original: Boyband V Girlband - Direction Of One Game Free
description:
The boys are back in town...and they want to perform to their adoring fans BUT the girls are standing in their way!

Boyband Vs Girlband puts you in the snazzy shoes of Larry the lead member of an awesome new boy band!
His band mates and army of fans are waiting for him but he needs to get past the Girlband and their weapons of annoying mutant teddies and angry speakers!

Featuring amazing graphics, addictive game-play and Power ups such as;

Magic Guitar - Discs will stick to Larry!

Spring Shoes - Larry will be able to jump higher!

Music Juice - Larry will be able to fly for a short while!

Invincibility Cloak - Larry will be invincible to enemies for a short while!

Music Blaster - Get rid of the enemies with more music blast notes!

Free Gameplay - you do not to make in-app purchases to enjoy this game, free features are available!

Also featuring!

Game Center Integration - Get a top score!

Universal App - Works with iPhone & iPad!

So what are you waiting for...get Larry to the stage & keep the screaming fans happy!
